data.title: Disclaimer - TRICARE Overseas
data.text: DisclaimerTRICARE Standard beneficiaries who reside in the Philippines and who seek care within the designated demonstration areasidentified in Phase I should use this search tool to find an Approved Demonstration Provider.Within Philippine Demonstration areas, if you do not seek care from an Approved Demonstration Provider and you do notreceive a waiver, you will be responsible for the full cost of care.If you get care outside of the Philippine Demonstration area, TRICARE will only cost share the claim if the Provider is certified.If you need to choose a non-Certified Provider outside of the Demonstration area, TRICARE will cost share the claim if theprovider successfully meets the certification criteria.Note: Pharmacy and dental services are NOT included in the Philippine Demonstration. For these services, beneficiaries shouldcontinue to select Philippines Certified Providers from this search tool.Pharmacy Certification Update:Mercury Drug and Rose Pharmacy are certified at their corporate level. Beneficiaries should confirm valid pharmacy locationthrough the corporate websites of Rose Pharmacy and Mercury Drug.• Manson Drug is no longer certified as of Oct 1, 2011.• South Star Pharmacy is no longer certified as of November 1, 2011.• Claims with a date of service before these dates will be honored and processed by the TOP Claims Processor.Philippines Pharmacy Changes: Effective September 1, 2011, reimbursement of pharmaceuticals in the Philippines will only becost-shared when purchased at a TRICARE certified licensed retail pharmacy or TRICARE certified hospital-based pharmacy.Pharmaceuticals purchased from and/or billed by your healthcare provider’s office will no longer be cost-shared by TRICARE.This list of Certified Providers also includes Approved Demonstration Providers, as TRICARE Certification is required for theseproviders.** Please note that the Philippine Approved/Certified Provider list will continue to be updated, to ensure the mostcomprehensive access to medical care for TRICARE beneficiaries residing in the Philippines. We strive to update the PhilippineApproved/Certified Provider list on the 1st and 15th of each month. If the 1st or 15th falls on a federal holiday or weekend, thelist will not be updated until the next business day. In addition, Global 24 Network Services will continue to develop this listthrough Phase I implementation on January 1, 2013. We will also continue to develop this list during the course of thePhilippine Demonstration, as appropriate and necessary. Please continue to check this website for updates as they becomeavailable. If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact support@GLOBAL24NS.com
